attributes.review: I have to restart my phone every time I open the app. It makes my phone freeze. Doesn’t even work. It also does absolutely nothing that I can’t easily do on the website. Don’t waste your time.

attributes.review: I really wanted to try and use this app for a class, but it never did anything but screw me over in the end. It glitched like crazy and even had some really sketchy links that made no sense for me. What a sham, find something better. This app is seriously worthless.
attributes.title: Worst App Ever

attributes.review: When I first opened up the app I was greeted by a message that said “keep america great” except it isn’t sooooooo. Then I saw a photo of Donald troompaloompa and started violently projectile vomiting EVERYWHERE. Afterwards I went into total organ failure. So don’t get this app unless you want everything to smell like trump aka VOM.
